availability: All users have access to this command. This command does not make sense if your useraccount does not have any subusers.

paramaters.Definition: Accounting ID (as got from command QueryAccountingList)
Type of this accounting entry, e.g. PAYMENT. Only allowed characters are capital letters, digits, "_" and "/"
The amount, e. g. the period for domain registrations, default = 1.  Only allowed values are non-negative integers and decimals
Payment made to the account, debited if < 0.  Only allowed values are negative and non-negative decimals with exactly two decimal places, e.g. -12.99
Additional VAT %, default = vat of the subuser account.  Only allowed values are non-negative integers and decimals
Payment reference, e. g. ID of a subuser
Date of the payment. Only dates with or without a timestamp in the format of YYYY-MM-DD and respectively YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS are allowed
